name: Blue_Mint6
description: Loose sketches of girl figures caught in a flow of emotions. A bit of hope on top of resignation, hesitation and melancholy. Exploration of flow, hand drawing, fast sketches and visible paint strokes. Created fully digitally in Photoshop. Mint 6 (out of 6) Edition of 5.  Mint 6 celebrates the beauty of typography, lovely flow of letter shapes are combined with the flow of the drawing, the background is grey so the letters may be blue, This is the typographic Mint.  Warsaw, FuzOne 30 04 2021
